text: Kulabo abayiphendula iNkosi yabo kunobuhle kanye nalabo abangazange bayiphendule ukube babengaba nakho konke okusemhlabeni kanye nokufana nakho kanye nakho babezonikela ngakho njengenhlengo, labo-ke okwabo ukwehlulelwa okubi futhi indawo yabo yokuhlala isihogo futhi yimbi ngempela leyo ndawo yokuphumula
